Package com.estore.api.estoreapi.persistence

Interface ProductDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductFileDAO
public interface ProductDAO
Defines the interface for Hero object persistence In this interface, we outline the required functions that should exist on the ProductFileDAO implementation

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      Product[] getProducts() throws IOException
      Retrieves all heroes
      Returns:
      An array of product objects, may be empty
      Throws:
      IOException - if an issue with underlying storage

    • findProducts

      Product[] findProducts(String containsText) throws IOException
      Finds all products whose name contains the given text
      Parameters:
      containsText - The text to match against
      Returns:
      An array of products whose names contains the given text, may be empty
      Throws:
      IOException - if an issue with underlying storage

    • getProduct

      Product getProduct(int id) throws IOException
      Retrieves a product with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the product to get
      Returns:
      a product object with the matching id
      null if no product with a matching id is found
      Throws:
      IOException - if an issue with underlying storage

    • createProduct

      Product createProduct(Product product) throws IOException
      Creates and saves a product
      Parameters:
      product - product object to be created and saved
      The id of the hero object is ignored and a new uniqe id is assigned
      Returns:
      new product if successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an issue with underlying storage

    • updateProduct

      Product updateProduct(Product product) throws IOException
      Updates and saves a product
      Parameters:
      product - product object to be updated and saved
      Returns:
      updated product if successful, null if product could not be found
      Throws:
      IOException - if underlying storage cannot be accessed

    • deleteProduct

      boolean deleteProduct(int id) throws IOException
      Deletes a product with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the product
      Returns:
      true if the product was deleted
      false if hero with the given id does not exist
      Throws:
      IOException - if underlying storage cannot be accessed
